# AnchoringComponent.Target.Alignment

**Structure**

Defines the alignment of real-world surfaces to seek as targets.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Alignment
```

## Choosing an alignment

- **horizontal**: Horizontal surfaces.
- **vertical**: Vertical surfaces.
- **any**: Surfaces of any alignment.

## Surface anchor characterization

- **AnchoringComponent.Target.Classification**: Defines types of real-world surfaces to seek as targets.
